name: Pseudo-Judo
description:
The year Is 2042, and the world is minutes away from total annihilation. Diplomacy has failed. Democracy has failed. Humanity has failed.

Or has it? Can a last ditch attempt to resolve all international conflict possibly succeed? The only path to world peace, is to decide which world leader is the most worthy of  the title of Supreme Commander of Earth. 

All world leaders enter, only one will leave. This...is....PSEUDO - JUDO!

Created as part of IGGI's 2023 game jam.

A game from Bobby, Toby, Dimitris and Ollie
